name: nosedive: day1
description:
A JJBA pt5 fan game. Follow Leone Abbacchio as he solves a murder in a small town motel. Contains adult content. Currently the game only contains day0 and day1.

If you like this project, please consider supporting it by donating a ko-fi! https://ko-fi.com/rhodart and follow the project @ https://twitter.com/nosedivegame

Created by winkblue@ao3 and rhoda_pomelo(twitter, instagram, tiktok). I do not claim ownership of fictional characters used.
